channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: リビア当局は、洪水に見舞われたデルナへのジャーナリストや援助関係者の立ち入りを制限し始めた。ある当局者は、救助チームの活動を可能にするためだと語っている（Sarah Dadouch/Washington Post）
item.description:
Sarah Dadouch / Washington Post:
Libyan officials have begun restricting access to flood-hit Derna for journalists and aid workers; one official says the move is to allow rescue teams to work  —  Libyan officials have begun to restrict access among reporters and aid groups to rescue and relief operations in Derna …

item.title: ソースパラマウント＋社は、レイプ疑惑1件と性的暴行疑惑4件を受け、ラッセル・ブランドのスタンダップ・コメディ特番『ラッセル・ブランド・イン・ニューヨーク・シティ』を1本削除した（ダニエル・アーキン／NBCニュース）。
item.description:
Daniel Arkin / NBC News:
Source: Paramount+ removed one Russell Brand stand-up comedy special, Russell Brand in New York City, after one allegation of rape and four of sexual assault  —  The streaming service follows YouTube and the BBC in distancing itself from the comedian, who has been accused by four women of sexual assault.

item.title: 出典ディズニーCEOボブ・アイガー、WBD CEOデヴィッド・ザスラブ、Netflix共同CEOテッド・サランドス、NBCユニバーサル・スタジオ・グループ会長ドナ・ラングレーがAMPTP-WGA協議に出席（Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Hollywood Reporter:
Source: Disney CEO Bob Iger, WBD CEO David Zaslav, Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos, and NBCUniversal Studio Group chair Donna Langley attend the AMPTP-WGA talks  —  “This is so long in coming; everyone's feeling pain.  Let's get in there and nail things down," says one source familiar …

item.title: 俳優のスティーブン・フライが、ハリー・ポッターの本のナレーションから生成されたと主張する自分の声の無許可バージョンを発見し、AIの危険性について警告している（Alexi Duggins/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Alexi Duggins / The Guardian:
Actor Stephen Fry warns about the dangers of AI after finding an unauthorized version of his voice he claims was generated from his Harry Potter book narration  —  Actor warns about dangers of artificial intelligence after discovering version of his voice based on Harry Potter audiobooks

item.title: ジャーナリストのスージー・バニカリムとジェシカ・ベネットは、iHeartPodcastsが配信する週刊ポップカルチャーポッドキャスト「In Retrospect」を9月21日に開始する予定だ（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
Journalists Susie Banikarim and Jessica Bennett plan to launch In Retrospect, a weekly pop culture podcast, on September 21, distributed by iHeartPodcasts  —  iHeartPodcasts and The Meteor are launching “In Retrospect,” a pop culture podcast by Emmy-winning journalist Susie Banikarim and New York Times editor Jessica Bennett.

item.title: アマゾン、50ドルのFire TV Stick 4K、60ドルのFire TV Stick 4K Max、120ドルの24インチFire TV Soundbar、Fire TV音声検索のジェネレーティブAIアップデートを発表（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Amazon announces the $50 Fire TV Stick 4K, the $60 Fire TV Stick 4K Max, the $120 24-inch Fire TV Soundbar, and generative AI updates for Fire TV voice search  —  At its annual devices event, Amazon updated its Fire TV lineup with new devices, including the Fire TV Stick 4K and Fire TV Stick 4K Max …

item.title: カイロがフランスの諜報機関を使ってエジプトの民間人を標的にしたという機密文書を取材した調査報道ジャーナリスト、アリアーヌ・ラブリユーをフランスが逮捕（Kim Willsher/The Guardian）
item.description:
Kim Willsher / The Guardian:
France arrests investigative journalist Ariane Lavrilleux, who covered classified documents alleging Cairo used French intelligence to target civilians in Egypt  —  Ariane Lavrilleux, who reported on leaked documents alleging French intelligence used to target civilians in Egypt, is in custody

item.title: アマゾン、50ドルのFire TV Stick 4K、60ドルのFire TV Stick 4K Max、120ドルの24インチFire TV Soundbar、Fire TV音声検索のジェネレーティブAIアップデートを発表（Brian Heater/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Brian Heater / TechCrunch:
Amazon announces the $50 Fire TV Stick 4K, the $60 Fire TV Stick 4K Max, the $120 24-inch Fire TV Soundbar, and generative AI updates for Fire TV voice search  —  Amazon just added another devices to the growing Fire TV family.  Unveiled at its Devices event in Virginia …

item.title: ムンバイを拠点とするKuku FMは、英語とインド6カ国語の音声コンテンツを月額1.20ドルで提供しているが、シリーズCで2,500万ドルを調達し、資金調達総額は6,000万ドルに達した（Manish Singh/TechCrunch）。
item.description:
Manish Singh / TechCrunch:
Mumbai-based Kuku FM, which offers audio content in English and six Indian languages for ~$1.20/month, raised a $25M Series C, taking its total funding to $60M  —  Google-backed audio content platform Kuku FM has raised $25 million in a new funding round as it looks to make deeper inroads …

item.title: マイケル・ウルフ著『The Fall』より抜粋：タッカー・カールソンの成功がいかにルパート・マードックの頭痛の種となり、カールソンをドミニオン和解の犠牲者にしたか（マイケル・ウルフ／New York Magazine）
item.description:
Michael Wolff / New York Magazine:
Excerpt from Michael Wolff's The Fall: how Tucker Carlson's success became a headache for Rupert Murdoch, making Carlson a casualty of the Dominion settlement  —  Rupert Murdoch didn't want to dump his ratings leader and favorite Fox host.  But was Tucker Carlson giving him a choice?

item.title: Substackは、レイアウトを変更し、ユーザーが読みたいものを見つけるのに役立つHomeタブを追加した、従来のソーシャルメディアアプリに近い感じのリデザインを公開した（Jay Peters/The Verge）。
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Substack shares its redesign, which changes the layout and adds a Home tab to help users find stuff to read, that feels more like a traditional social media app  —  After a tease in a blog post on Tuesday, Substack officially shared details about its redesigned app on Wednesday, which offers a new …

item.title: ChatGPTの訓練に著書を使用し、著者の著作権を侵害した疑いで、著作者組合と10人以上の著名小説家がOpenAIを提訴（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
The Authors Guild and more than a dozen prominent novelists sue OpenAI over allegedly infringing on authors' copyrights by using their books to train ChatGPT  —  The suit, filed with the Authors Guild, accuses the A.I. company of infringing on authors' copyrights, claiming it used their books to train its ChatGPT chatbot.

item.title: モスクワの裁判所は、WSJのエヴァン・ガーシュコビッチ記者の公判前勾留に対する上訴を却下した。
item.description:
Anna Chernova / CNN:
A Moscow court refuses to hear an appeal against WSJ reporter Evan Gershkovich's pre-trial detention, meaning he could remain in jail until at least November 30  —  Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich will remain behind bars after a Moscow court refused to hear an appeal against his pre-trial detention on Tuesday.

item.title: ロンドン・ルートン空港の警察は8月、シリアのクルド人支配地域で活動していた英国人ジャーナリストを逮捕せずに5時間拘束した（Dan Sabbagh/The Guardian）
item.description:
Dan Sabbagh / The Guardian:
Police at London Luton Airport held a British journalist, who had worked in a Kurdish-controlled part of Syria, for five hours in August without arresting him  —  Matt Broomfield, who has worked in Kurdish-controlled north-east Syria, had his phone and laptop seized when he was questioned last month

item.title: ガーディアン紙がデジタル版欧州版を創刊、「世界の問題に欧州の視点を」提供、英、米、豪、海外に次ぐ第5版（ガーディアン紙）
item.description:
The Guardian:
The Guardian launches a digital Europe edition to offer “a European lens on world issues”, the fifth edition after the UK, the US, Australia, and international  —  Expanded presence to showcase original journalism and highlight issues that matter to European readers
